meanings.definition: The combination of circumstances at a given time.
meanings.sent1: In some situations, it may rain unexpectedly.
meanings.sent2: She handled the difficult situation with grace.
meanings.sent3: The situation became comical when the cat chased its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The situation was like a tangled knot that needed unraveling.
meanings.sent5: The situation felt like a storm brewing on the horizon.

meanings.definition: A set of circumstances in which one finds oneself.
meanings.sent1: During stressful situations, take deep breaths to calm down.
meanings.sent2: He navigated through the unfamiliar situation with caution.
meanings.sent3: The situation turned amusing when he realized he wore mismatched socks.
meanings.sent4: The situation was a maze he had to find his way out of.
meanings.sent5: The situation was a dark cloud hanging over his head.

meanings.definition: The way in which something is placed in relation to its surroundings.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully considered the best situation for the sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The ideal situation for the plant is in direct sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The situation of the vase on the edge of the table made everyone nervous.
meanings.sent4: The situation of the house on top of the hill gave it a majestic view.
meanings.sent5: The situation of the tree in the middle of the garden brought a sense of peace.
